review: I love kitchen gadgets. Two earlier devices of different design worked poorly, but this one is quick and easy. It removes strawberry stem and leaves with a simple twist of the wrist. A paring knife removes too much if you intend leaving the "berry" shape for garnish.Combined with a strawberry/mushroom slicer (not a wire type egg slicer) this tool can prepare a half-gallon of berries for a whole bunch of shortcakes with less time and effort than would be the case with a knife.
